column1: Topic title: Jofri Jaraiee  Sarawak PAS To Make Announcement On

column8: Pujut State Election result in 2016 Sarawak Election Sarawak PAS has yet to decide whether to field its candidate for the coming Pujut by-election scheduled to be held on July 4.PAS Sarawak commissioner Jofri Jaraiee said the party would make the announcement next week after the Kuching High Court decides on June 19 on the Originating Summons filed by former Pujut assemblyman Dr Ting Tiong Choon to challenge his disqualification.“Many factors will be taken into account including our preparation for the 14th General Election (GE14) that is expected to be held this year before a final decision can be made, we must be prepared for GE14 also,” he told Bernama here yesterday.Meanwhile DAP Sarawak is expected to name its candidate for the by-election on Friday with the party secretary, who also former Piasau assemblyman Alan Ling Sie Kiong, likely to be nominated.In 2016 state election, DAP’s Dr Ting won the Pujut seat with a majority vote of 1,759 defeating Barisan Nasional(BN) direct candidate Datuk Hii King Chiong, PAS’ Jofri and independent candidate Fong Pau Teck.  — Bernamahttp://www.theborneopost.com/2017/06/15/sa...tform=hootsuite
deciding whether to lose deposit or not
